meanings.definition: A half turn on a horse in dressage.
meanings.sent1: During the demivolte, the horse gracefully pivoted.
meanings.sent2: The demivolte is a beautiful movement in dressage.
meanings.sent3: The demivolte made the audience cheer with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her demivolte on the horse was like a dancer on stage.
meanings.sent5: The demivolte of the horse was a mesmerizing sight.
